prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that resembles a shell and has a playful personality.
Imagine a tiny aquatic creature with a shiny silver shell and a goofy expression.
Generate a Pokemon inspired by sea creatures, featuring a round body and a long tongue.
Show me a Pokemon that looks like a clam with big eyes and a unique color scheme.
Design a cute water-type Pokemon with a sturdy shell and a friendly demeanor.
Give me a Pokemon that is small, round, and loves to hide in its shell.
Make a Pokemon that represents the ocean, combining smooth textures and vibrant colors.
